data.message: I have a hard time figuring out how to change settings n then when I do it doesn't work right. So irritated.

replies.message: Hey, Beth. Which settings are you trying to adjust? You might try searching through our Help Center for more info: http://on.fb.me/1vcL1of Hope this helps! -Kristen

The main one I have trouble with is receiving pokes through my texts in my phone. I'll check settings n they r right but won't always come through. Oh and btw how high will pokes go before it resets?  I was in real high numbers with someone n at some point it reset n neither of us noticed.
